text: Luis Guillermo Solís Rivera (born 25 April 1958)Biography by CIDOB (in Spanish) is a Costa Rican politician. He was the President of Costa Rica from 2014 to 2018. He is a member of the Citizens' Action Party (PAC). == References == == Other websites == Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:People from San José, Costa Rica Category:Presidents of Costa Rica
title: Luis Guillermo Solís
